body.name: Pampers Pure Protection Diapers - Size 4, 150 Count, Hypoallergenic Premium Disposable Baby Diapers
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 16. Order within 37 mins
features: Pampers Pure Protection diapers are gentle on skin while providing outstanding leak protection
Nourish and protect skin with our absorbent liner enriched with shea butter and outer cover made with premium cotton* (*Soft outer cover contains 15% cotton)
Hypoallergenic and free of elemental chlorine, fragrance, parabens, natural rubber and latex* (*0% PARABENS AND LATEX: Latex - natural rubber)
Made with FSC-certified sustainably sourced pulp, 100% certified renewable energy, and 0% manufacturing waste to landfill* (*All Global Baby Care factories. Diaper manufacturing in North America)
Featuring adorable designer prints and reassuring wetness indicator, so you always know when it's time for a change
New look! Product and packaging may vary
body.description: Your search for pure protection that works is over! Designed to help skin stay dry and healthy, Pampers Pure Protection diapers lock wetness away from skin for up to 12 hours for outstanding leakage protection with skin-loving care. Plus, our designer, boutique prints make Pampers Pure just as precious as they are protecting. We’ve thoughtfully chosen all of our ingredients to care for your baby’s precious skin. Our exclusive, plant-based liner** is enriched with shea butter to help nourish and protect skin while our outercover is enhanced with premium cotton, making Pampers Pure Protection diapers irresistibly soft and breathable. But the ingredients we’ve chosen to leave out are just as important. That’s why Pampers Pure Protection diapers are free of elemental chlorine, fragrance, parabens, and latex* and are hypoallergenic. *Natural rubber **Plant-based and polypropylene blend The Seal of Cotton and cotton enhanced™ are trademarks of Cotton Incorporated. cotton enhanced™ soft outercover contains 15% cotton.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What we always get
reviews.reviewText: These are good diapers, minimal scent, minimal irritation on the baby. Absorbs well. Did have some overnight leaks so we switched her an overnight diaper. Otherwise these things are very good, good velcro straps. We get the same brand every time

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice clean ingredients
reviews.reviewText: These diapers are the best and I don't use anything else on my daughter. We had tried a few different brands when she was little and everything was giving her a rash. We finally made the switch to pampers pure and haven't had any issues since. Good price, great quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Our daughter has only pee thru these maybe twice in one year. We prefer this brand to all others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Always work perfect
reviews.reviewText: Love these diapers and love that they NEVER leak! Love that they pure so no harmful chemicals come in contact with toddlers skin!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cut down tremendously on my kids rashes
reviews.reviewText: We've tried other brands and they were either scented or not. But almost all of them somehow led to rashes. So we kept coming back to this particular version/brand and each time the rashes went away. So we're still "stuck" on these for our last kid. It's expensive, but the comfort is worthwhile. Pair these with Huggies Natural Wipes and it's 10/10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best diaper ever
reviews.reviewText: This is a great diaper. We normally use them for the night since it can absorve more liquid and avoid the skin hashes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are our favorite diapers. I can tell they are made with higher quality materials and less chemicals than the cheap brands, and even the regular pampers, but they are still so absorbent. My babies have less rashes with these than with the cheap diapers, even with less frequent diaper changes because of the great absorbency. I also love buying on the Prime subscription and not having to worry about restocking diapers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars didn’t hold up
reviews.reviewText: diaper was falling apart and pieces of diaper was on my baby each time i change his diaper
